p: The ‘Somel’ dataset used to validate the increased PeGeT/DeGeT/ ALiGeT scores of schizophrenia genes, and EWCE enrichments, was downloaded from the GEO repository (accession GSE11512) ( Somel et al., 2009). The dataset comprised samples taken from dorsolateral prefrontal cortex, which had been hybridised to Affymetrix Human Genome U133 +arrays. The dataset was read into R using the bioconductor ‘ affy’ package, and processed using RMA. Probes with detection probabilities of less than 0.05 in over ten of the arrays were dropped.
